org.coniks.crypto

Class Signing

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.crypto.Signing

  • public class Signing
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all digital signature operations for CONIKS. Currently supported algorithms: RSA with SHA-256 and DSA.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SIG_SIZE_BYTES
      The size of a 2048-bit RSA signature in bytes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Signing()

      Generate the DSA digital signature of msg using key.

      Verify the DSA signature sig of msg using pk.
      static byte[] rsaSign(java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey key, byte[] msg)
      Generate the RSA digital signature of msg using key.

    • Method Detail

      • rsaSign

        public static byte[] rsaSign(java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey key,
             byte[] msg)
                      throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Generate the RSA digital signature of msg using key.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to be signed.
        key - The RSAPrivateKey to use for signing.
        Returns:
        The byte[] containing the digital signature of the msg, or null in case of an error.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • rsaVerify

        public static boolean rsaVerify(java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey pk,
                byte[] msg,
                byte[] sig)
                         throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Verify the RSA signature sig of msg using pk.
        Returns:
        true if the signature on the message is valid, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        {@link - java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException NoSuchAlgorithmException}
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

        Returns:
        The byte[] containing the digital signature of the msg, or null in case of an error.
